  "title": "UI / UX Designer",
  "description": "Excite Panacea is a premier technology service provider. Our depth of experience, expertise, and attention to detail result in successful projects and contribute to Excite&#39;s status as the preferred technology partner in the region.

We&rsquo;ve built long-term client partnerships by fulfilling promises and consistently providing quality to businesses across diverse industries&mdash;including Consumer Packaged Goods (CPG), Manufacturing, Alcoholic Beverages, Oil &amp; Gas, Transportation, Agriculture, Travel &amp; Tourism, and more&mdash;throughout sub-Saharan&nbsp;Africa.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position:&nbsp;UI / UX Designer

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos
Job type: Contract

Job Overview


	Our organization is seeking a creative and detail-oriented UI/UX Designer / Developer with a strong background in creating user-centered digital experiences.
	The ideal candidate will have 3+ years of proven experience in designing and developing engaging, intuitive, and functional interfaces across web and mobile platforms.
	You will collaborate closely with product managers, developers, and business stakeholders to translate requirements into visually appealing and technically sound designs that elevate user experience and business outcomes.
	This role is perfect for a professional who is passionate about design thinking, digital innovation, and building seamless user journeys that align with strategic goals.


Key Responsibilities
User Experience &amp; Interface Design:


	Design user interfaces for web and mobile applications that are visually appealing and easy to navigate.
	Conduct user research, gather insights, and translate findings into design solutions.
	Develop wireframes, prototypes, and high-fidelity mockups that communicate design intent.
	Ensure consistency in design standards, typography, and brand elements across platforms.


Development &amp; Implementation:


	Collaborate with front-end and back-end developers to implement and refine user interfaces.
	Utilize HTML, CSS, JavaScript (and frameworks like React, Angular, Vue.js, etc.) to bring designs to life.
	Optimize applications for maximum speed, responsiveness, and scalability.
	Participate in usability testing and iterate designs based on feedback and performance metrics.


Collaboration &amp; Continuous Improvement:


	Work with cross-functional teams to define user flows, journey maps, and design systems.
	Stay updated on industry trends, UI/UX best practices, and emerging technologies.
	Contribute to continuous improvement of design processes and tools within the organization.


Requirements
Educational Qualification:


	Bachelor&rsquo;s Degree in Computer Science, Design, or a related field (preferred).


Skill Requirements


	Minimum of 3 years of experience as a UI/UX Designer or Front-End Developer.
	Proven track record in designing and developing responsive web and mobile applications.
	Proficiency in design and prototyping tools such as Figma, Adobe XD, Sketch, or InVision.
	Strong knowledge of HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and modern frameworks (React, Angular, Vue.js).
	Solid understanding of user-centered design principles and accessibility standards.
	Excellent visual design skills, with a keen eye for detail, layout, and typography.
	Strong communication, analytical thinking, and problem-solving abilities.
	Ability to collaborate effectively with developers and stakeholders in a fast-paced environment.


Additional Requirements:
Applicants must include the following in their application:


	Portfolio or GitHub link showcasing relevant data projects.
	Summary of work done including technologies used and impact achieved.
	Industries served (e.g., fintech, retail, logistics, enterprise systems, etc.).

UI / UX Designer Job at Excite Panacea Limited




        
    

        
        Excite Panacea is a premier technology service provider. Our depth of experience, expertise, and attention to detail result in successful projects and contribute to Excite's status as the preferred technology partner in the region.

We’ve built long-term client partnerships by fulfilling promises and consistently providing quality to businesses across diverse industries—including Consumer Packaged Goods (CPG), Manufacturing, Alcoholic Beverages, Oil & Gas, Transportation, Agriculture, Travel & Tourism, and more—throughout sub-Saharan Africa.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: UI / UX Designer
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



Job Location: Lagos
Job type: Contract

Job Overview


	Our organization is seeking a creative and detail-oriented UI/UX Designer / Developer with a strong background in creating user-centered digital experiences.
	The ideal candidate will have 3+ years of proven experience in designing and developing engaging, intuitive, and functional interfaces across web and mobile platforms.
	You will collaborate closely with product managers, developers, and business stakeholders to translate requirements into visually appealing and technically sound designs that elevate user experience and business outcomes.
	This role is perfect for a professional who is passionate about design thinking, digital innovation, and building seamless user journeys that align with strategic goals.


Key Responsibilities
User Experience & Interface Design:


	Design user interfaces for web and mobile applications that are visually appealing and easy to navigate.
	Conduct user research, gather insights, and translate findings into design solutions.
	Develop wireframes, prototypes, and high-fidelity mockups that communicate design intent.
	Ensure consistency in design standards, typography, and brand elements across platforms.


Development & Implementation:


	Collaborate with front-end and back-end developers to implement and refine user interfaces.
	Utilize HTML, CSS, JavaScript (and frameworks like React, Angular, Vue.js, etc.) to bring designs to life.
	Optimize applications for maximum speed, responsiveness, and scalability.
	Participate in usability testing and iterate designs based on feedback and performance metrics.


Collaboration & Continuous Improvement:


	Work with cross-functional teams to define user flows, journey maps, and design systems.
	Stay updated on industry trends, UI/UX best practices, and emerging technologies.
	Contribute to continuous improvement of design processes and tools within the organization.


Requirements
Educational Qualification:


	Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Design, or a related field (preferred).


Skill Requirements


	Minimum of 3 years of experience as a UI/UX Designer or Front-End Developer.
	Proven track record in designing and developing responsive web and mobile applications.
	Proficiency in design and prototyping tools such as Figma, Adobe XD, Sketch, or InVision.
	Strong knowledge of HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and modern frameworks (React, Angular, Vue.js).
	Solid understanding of user-centered design principles and accessibility standards.
	Excellent visual design skills, with a keen eye for detail, layout, and typography.
	Strong communication, analytical thinking, and problem-solving abilities.
	Ability to collaborate effectively with developers and stakeholders in a fast-paced environment.


Additional Requirements:
Applicants must include the following in their application:


	Portfolio or GitHub link showcasing relevant data projects.
	Summary of work done including technologies used and impact achieved.
	Industries served (e.g., fintech, retail, logistics, enterprise systems, etc.).


Note: Applications without a portfolio or project link will not be considered.

Operational Standards & QHSE Manager Job at Bourbon Interoil Nigeria Limited




        
    

        
        Bourbon Interoil Nigeria Limited, as leading international player in marine services, offers to the most demanding oil & gas clients worldwide a full line of innovative, safe, high performance and new generation vessels and an expanded offer of offshore oil & gas services.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Operational Standards & QHSE Manager

Reference: 2025-2103
Job Location: Nigeria

Mission
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Lead the strategic development and implementation of operational standards and QHSE expectations across the entire organization (Marine and Logistics, Mobility, Base, Office and Accommodation, etc.) in line with statutory, regulatory, clients, and other stakeholders’ expectations.
	Ensures the deployment, implementation, and improvement of the Bourbon Safety Management and Quality Management System tailored to fit in line with the Management principles stated in the BINL policies.


Responsibilities


	Manage the BINL Quality and HSE processes. 
	Deploy the Operational Standards across the entire Organization.
	Manage Quality and HSE Culture of BINL and its employees, check implementation.
	Develop and Manage HSE and Quality Campaigns and Solutions for Operational Safety.
	Optimize cost and time for remote participation in Safety Meetings. Budget Compliance.
	Sustain Client confidence through active participation in Client's QHSE Meetings.
	Ensure Formalized Quality and HSE competency development for the QHSE team.
	Enhance Administrative, Supervisory and managerial competencies of the QHSE team.
	Act As Designated Person Assure for All BINL Surfer. As required by the ISM and ISPS codes.
	Control all documents from Assist Authors / Process Owners in line to BOURBON Document Standard and structure.
	Track and keep record of Situation Report as well as Management Vessel Visit.
	Monitoring client satisfaction, the QHSE Manager shall follow and measure processes and services given by BINL against policies, objectives, and requirements for the product and report the results taking actions to continually improve the process.
	The QHSE manager shall ensure that customer requirements are defined and met to enhance customer satisfaction. 
	Enhance Mutual Understanding with Clients and Operational Safety Management issues.


Qualifications, Skills and Experiences


	Minimum of postgraduate qualification in Sciences, Engineering, HSE or Management (MSC, MBA etc.)
	Minimum of ten (10) years of postgraduate experience in Sciences, Engineering, or Management out of which Seven (7) is at HSE Management level within the marine industry.

  "description": "Springpet Homes Limited is a leading real estate development and investment company dedicated to redefining the standards of modern living through structure, innovation, and integrity. Incorporated under the Companies and Allied Matters Act, Springpet Homes operates as a subsidiary of Velstra Holdings Limited, with a strategic focus on real estate development, project management, and investment advisory services across Nigeria&rsquo;s rapidly evolving property market.

Job Position: Business Development Manager - Real Estate&nbsp;&nbsp;

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Reports to: Head of Commercial
Department: Commercial

Job Description


	The Business Development Manager (BDM) is a key revenue-generating role focused on identifying, qualifying, and securing new business opportunities.
	The BDM will be responsible for building a robust pipeline through proactive outreach, nurturing client relationships, and converting leads into sales.
	This role is crucial for expanding the company&rsquo;s client base and partner network.


Responsibilities
Lead Generation &amp; Prospecting:


	Actively seek out and generate new sales leads through networking, cold calling,
	market research, and attending industry events.
	Build and maintain a healthy sales pipeline to ensure consistent achievement of
	sales targets.
	Develop and implement targeted outreach strategies for different customer&nbsp;segments (e.g., high-net-worth individuals, corporate clients, diaspora investors).


Client &amp; Partner Relationship Management:


	Build and maintain strong, long-lasting customer relationships by understanding&nbsp;their needs and providing tailored real estate solutions.
	Onboard, manage, and nurture relationships with realtor partners, ensuring they&nbsp;are equipped and motivated to sell Springpet Homes&#39; properties.
	Serve as a key point of contact for new clients, guiding them through the initial&nbsp;stages of the buyer journey.


Sales Execution &amp; Conversion:


	Conduct property presentations and site inspections for potential buyers and partners.
	Prepare and present sales proposals and quotations.
	Negotiate terms and close sales agreements, ensuring a smooth handover to the operations team for fulfillment.


Market Intelligence:


	Provide feedback from the field on market trends, competitor offerings, and customer preferences to the Head of Commercial and marketing team.
	Identify opportunities for new product development or service enhancements based on market demand.


Requirements


	Bachelor&rsquo;s Degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or a related field.
	Minimum of 5 years of proven experience in business development or sales, preferably in the real estate sector.
	A portfolio of previous sales achievements and, if applicable, key projects or clients managed.
	A strong existing network of contacts in the real estate or related industries is a significant advantage.
	Proven ability to meet and exceed sales targets.


Competencies &amp; Skills:


	Hunter Mentality: Proactive, persistent, and results-driven.

	Strong Negotiation &amp; Persuasion Skills.
	Self-Motivated &amp; Able to Work Autonomously.
	Customer-Focused.

  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Senior Accountant",
  "description": "Springpet Homes Limited&nbsp;is a fast-growing real estate development and construction brand committed to redefining modern living in Lagos. The organization delivers high-value residential and commercial properties, supported by a fully integrated construction subsidiary that ensures quality, speed, and structural excellence across all projects.


With a culture built on innovation, trust, and operational discipline, the company focuses on providing clients with secure investments, well-planned developments, and exceptional customer experience. Its teams work collaboratively to drive seamless project execution, uphold compliance standards, and consistently raise the bar in the real estate and construction space.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Senior Accountant

Job Location:&nbsp;Lekki,&nbsp;Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Position Summary


	The Senior Accountant will play a critical role in ensuring the integrity of accounting information and the timely production of financial reports.
	This position is responsible for managing complex accounting tasks, leading the month-end close process, and ensuring compliance with accounting standards.
	The ideal candidate will have 4-7 years of progressive accounting experience, a strong understanding of GAAP, and a proven ability to improve processes.
